product_name: Sugoi RSX Bike Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: For your epic cross-country mountain biking rides, wear the men's Sugoi RSX Bike Shorts. They provide high-performance fabric and a detachable liner brief with a chamois for all-day comfort. Lightweight stretch-woven outer shell provides ergonomic comfort during dynamic pedaling movement. Fabric wicks moisture and dries fast. Bonded mesh paneling aids airflow and breathability. Icefil(R) liner brief feels cool on your skin during warm-weather rides; chamois delivers comfort. BOA L5 dial closure system offers a secure and comfortable waistband fit. Sugoi RSX Bike Shorts for men feature a close fit. Closeout.
short_description: For your epic cross-country mountain biking rides, wear the men's Sugoi RSX Bike Shorts. They provide high-performance fabric and a detachable liner brief with a chamois for all-day comfort.
